article.headline: Texas-Arlington 52, McNeese St. 46
article.story: LAKE CHARLES, La. (AP) -- Ro'ger Guignard's 3-pointer with 36 seconds left helped Texas-Arlington finish off McNeese State in a 52-46 victory over the Cowboys on Saturday. The Mavericks (10-14, 5-6 Southland Conference) led for most of the game, but the Cowboys rallied to pull within 47-46 with 1:08 left. Guignard then hit his 3-pointer and Cardell Hunter tacked on two free throws for the winning margin. Rodrick Epps led Texas-Arlington with 13 points and Guignard finished with 12. Texas-Arlington outrebounded the Cowboys 41-39 and committed two fewer turnovers. McNeese (9-15, 4-6) led 19-18 with 5:15 left in the opening half before falling behind for good shortly after. McNeese's Jarvis Bradley was the game's leading scorer with 17 points, 15 of those coming in the second half. Both teams struggled with their shooting, each hitting only 33.3 percent. McNeese made only two of 16 3-point shots, while Texas-Arlington was 6-of-19 from long range. The Mavericks were 8-of-16 at the foul line and the Cowboys 10-of-16.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
